product_name: The North Face Ederra Rain Jacket - Women's
long_description: Who says rain jackets have to come in solid colors? Stand out in the patterned yet technical Ederra rain jacket from The North Face. Waterproof, windproof, breathable and seam sealed; low in weight for wearing year-round. Fully adjustable hood with hidden drawcord system. Brushed chin guard lining. Pit-zip vents. Adjustable hem and cuffs; zippered hand pockets. The North Face Ederra rain jacket stows into a hand pocket.
short_description: Who says rain jackets have to come in solid colors? Stand out in the patterned yet technical Ederra rain jacket from The North Face.
